tool.name: OGS: convertToLinearMesh
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'convertToLinearMesh'.
tool.command: for i in $input_mesh_file; do if [ "$i" != "None" ] && [ ! -e "$(basename $i)" ]; then ln -s "$i" "$(basename $i)"; fi; done; convertToLinearMesh --input-mesh-file '$input_mesh_file.element_identifier' --output-mesh-file output_1.vtu
tool.help: This tool runs the **convertToLinearMesh** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
